title: Mission Workshop Mass Transit Duffle
content:
Mission Workshop’s Transit Duffle (27L $320) is an exemplary bag  design, allowing for quick and easy attachment to a bicycle portage rack or just to be used as a standard day bag for quick travel plans or carrying a laptop around. This week, Mission announced a larger bag within the Transit family dubbed the Mass Transit Duffle (33L $ 325) with 25% more carrying capacity…

Designed for travel, it is lightweight, durable, and sewn with care using X-Pac® VX21, known for its exceptional abrasion, tear, and weather resistance per gram weight.

The bag’s exterior features YKK Aquaguard matte-finish zippers, a large laptop compartment, two zip pockets for pens, cords, and chargers, and four open compartments for magazines, books, and water bottles. The interior offers 33.6 Liters (2,050 cubic inches) of capacity and four side organizational dividers.

The Mass Transit can be carried with grab handles that tuck away when not in use or a removable quick-adjust shoulder strap that utilizes our custom aluminum hardware.

Specs:

  • Holds up to a 16 ” laptop
  • Attaches to porteur bike racks
  • YKK water resistant coated nylon zippers
  • All metal snaps
  • Milspec webbing
  • Custom Hardware Shoulder Strap
  • Optional Backpack Straps
  • 4 external quick access pockets
  • 2 external zippered pockets
  • 4 internal quick access pockets
  • 1 external zippered laptop pocket
  • Made in the USA

 

See more at Mission Workshop.

The post Mission Workshop Mass Transit Duffle appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
